mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Murphey, Daniel

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Murphey, Daniel Patient Age: 34. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound right arm. Location Wounded: Near New Market, VA. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Conical ball. Result: Transferred to kitchen.
